45 // Constructor
51 VehicleState::VehicleState(MultiThreadedNode& node) :
52  node_(node),
53  timestamp_initial_(node.getInitialTimestamp()), // Initialize timestamp_initial_ with the value from MultiThreadedNode
54  timestamp_(node.getInitialTimestamp()),
55  position_(Eigen::Vector3d::Zero()),
56  q_(Eigen::Quaterniond::Identity()),
57  velocity_(Eigen::Vector3d::Zero()),
58  angular_velocity_(Eigen::Vector3d::Zero()),
59  euler_angles_rpy_(Eigen::Vector3d::Zero()),
60  time_odometry_(0.0),
61  is_offset_odometry_msg_(true),
62  timestamp_offset_(0),
63  position_offset_(Eigen::Vector3d::Zero()),
64  q_offset_(Eigen::Quaterniond::Identity()),
65  euler_angles_rpy_offset_(Eigen::Vector3d::Zero()),
66  yaw_quaternion_inverse_offset_(Eigen::Quaterniond::Identity())
67 {}

172 // Setter function for the time in seconds that has passed from the initial timestamp to the latest received message
173 void VehicleState::setTimeOdometryInSeconds()
174 {
175  time_odometry_ = static_cast<double>(timestamp_ - timestamp_initial_) / 1e6;
176 }

198 // Setter function for the euler_angles_rpy_offset_
199 void VehicleState::setEulerAnglesRPYOffset(const Eigen::Quaterniond& q_offset) {
200  Eigen::Vector3d euler_angles_rpy_offset = quaternionToEulerAnglesRPY(q_offset);
201  euler_angles_rpy_offset_ = euler_angles_rpy_offset;
202 }

204 /*
205  Setter function for the yaw_quaternion_inverse_offset_
206 */
207 void VehicleState::setYawQuaternionInverseOffset()
208 {
209  Eigen::Quaterniond yaw_quaternion = Eigen::Quaterniond(cos(euler_angles_rpy_offset_(2)/2),
210  0,
211  0,
212  sin(euler_angles_rpy_offset_(2)/2));
213 
214  yaw_quaternion_inverse_offset_ = yaw_quaternion.inverse();
215 
216 }
217 
218 /*
219  Computing Euler Angles from the unit quaternion following a 3-2-1 rotation sequence
220  The Euler Angles are ordered as: roll, pitch, yaw
221  For reference:
222  - https://github.com/PX4/PX4-Matrix/blob/master/matrix/Euler.hpp
223  - https://github.com/PX4/PX4-Matrix/blob/master/matrix/Dcm.hpp
224 */
225 Eigen::Vector3d VehicleState::quaternionToEulerAnglesRPY(const Eigen::Quaterniond& q) {
226  Eigen::Vector3d euler_angles_rpy;
227 
228  // Compute elements of Direction Cosine Matrix (DCM) from quaternion
229  double a = q.w();
230  double b = q.x();
231  double c = q.y();
232  double d = q.z();
233  double aa = a * a;
234  double ab = a * b;
235  double ac = a * c;
236  double ad = a * d;
237  double bb = b * b;
238  double bc = b * c;
239  double bd = b * d;
240  double cc = c * c;
241  double cd = c * d;
242  double dd = d * d;
243 
244  // Compute DCM elements
245  double dcm00 = aa + bb - cc - dd;
246  // double dcm01 = 2 * (bc - ad); // not needed by the algorithm
247  double dcm02 = 2 * (ac + bd);
248  double dcm10 = 2 * (bc + ad);
249  // double dcm11 = aa - bb + cc - dd; // not needed by the algorithm
250  double dcm12 = 2 * (cd - ab);
251  double dcm20 = 2 * (bd - ac);
252  double dcm21 = 2 * (ab + cd);
253  double dcm22 = aa - bb - cc + dd;
254 
255  // Compute Euler angles from DCM
256  euler_angles_rpy.y() = asin(-dcm20);
257 
258  if (fabs(euler_angles_rpy.y() - M_PI / 2) < 1.0e-3) {
259  euler_angles_rpy.x() = 0;
260  euler_angles_rpy.z() = atan2(dcm12, dcm02);
261  } else if (fabs(euler_angles_rpy.y() + M_PI / 2) < 1.0e-3) {
262  euler_angles_rpy.x() = 0;
263  euler_angles_rpy.z() = atan2(-dcm12, -dcm02);
264  } else {
265  euler_angles_rpy.x() = atan2(dcm21, dcm22);
266  euler_angles_rpy.z() = atan2(dcm10, dcm00);
267  }
268 
269  return euler_angles_rpy;
270 }

multi_threaded_node.hpp
Multithreaded ROS2 node that joins together all the flight stack components.
vehicle_state.hpp
Class storing the state of the vehicle coming from the flight controller (Pixhawk)
